mapper.insert: insert into ecs_orders (oId, oType, handover, name, weight, youjiren, maddress, saddress, ostate, mphone, consignee, cphone, startcity, middlecity, endcity, sprice, pprice, yprice, zprice, vehicle, note ) values (#{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{otype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{handover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{youjiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{maddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{saddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ostate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{middlecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{pprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{yprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{zprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update ecs_orders set oType = #{otype,jdbcType=INTEGER}, handover = #{handover,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weight = #{weight,jdbcType=INTEGER}, youjiren = #{youjiren,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, maddress = #{maddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, saddress = #{saddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ostate = #{ostate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, mphone = #{mphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, consignee = #{consignee,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cphone = #{cphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, startcity = #{startcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, middlecity = #{middlecity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, endcity = #{endcity,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sprice = #{sprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, pprice = #{pprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, yprice = #{yprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, zprice = #{zprice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vehicle = #{vehicle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, note = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where oId = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select oId, oType, handover, name, weight, youjiren, maddress, saddress, ostate, mphone, consignee, cphone, startcity, middlecity, endcity, sprice, pprice, yprice, zprice, vehicle, note from ecs_orders where oId = #{oid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select oId, oType, handover, name, weight, youjiren, maddress, saddress, ostate, mphone, consignee, cphone, startcity, middlecity, endcity, sprice, pprice, yprice, zprice, vehicle, note from ecs_orders
